properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 2 at 2:11PM PST until February 4 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Steep seas of 12 to 14 feet dominated by northwest swell
at 12 seconds are expected through early this evening, becoming
very steep 15 to 16 ft at 12 to 13 seconds late this evening
through early Monday morning. North to northwest winds 20 to 30
kt through early Monday morning. Then steep seas of 10 to 14 ft
at 12 seconds are expected late Monday morning through Monday
night.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 7 PM this evening
to 7 AM PST Monday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 PM
PST this evening. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 AM
Monday to 4 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Very steep and hazardous seas could capsize or damage
vessels. Bar crossing will become especially treacherous.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Recreational boaters should remain in port. Commercial vessels
should prepare for very steep seas and consider remaining in port
until conditions improve.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM PST MONDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM MONDAY TO 4 AM PST TUESDAY
